subject: Books and Literature
Book Trade and Publishing
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The story of an eight-oar crew and its quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics tops the list of best-selling sports books again in July 2015, according to the New York Times best-seller list.
